Detailed Description

Path command to draw a quadratic Bezier curve.

See also:
SVG quadratic curve specification

Definition at line 129 of file Path.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SVG::QuadraticCurveTo::QuadraticCurveTo ( const Point &  inPoint  ) 

Draw quadratic curve using absolute coordinates.

Parameters:
inPoint End point of curve.
See also:
SVG quadratic curve specification

The control point is assumed to be the reflection of the control point on the previous command relative to the current point. If previous command is not a QuadraticCurveTo, assume the control point is coincident with the current point.

Draw quadratic curve using relative coordinates.

Parameters:
inPos End position of curve.
See also:
SVG quadratic curve specification

The control point is assumed to be the reflection of the control point on the previous command relative to the current point. If previous command is not a QuadraticCurveTo, assume the control point is coincident with the current point.
